messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: Be advised. Wizards are running amok.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: can confirm this is not true

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: Thich ich yoo'oo captain' chpeakiiing. I'M DRUNK!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Blunt Environment 44. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Post - Science.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Over the top sentences are now illegal you may only speak in 2 words now

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: not speaking

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: in two words

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: oh shit i dun fucked up

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: IS PUNISHABLE BY DEATH AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA *static*

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I have no idea what I'm doing.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Massive bluespace anomaly detected en route to Blunt Environment 44. Brace for impact.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I am scared

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: pranked

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Xenobiology Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: warning space pirates detected ready yourselves crew

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Unidentified armed ship detected near the station.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Data theft signal detected, source registered on local gps units.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Blunt Environment 44, please stand-by.
